item.title: Cloud On The Cheap
item.description: Big corporations are shifting their data centers to the cloud for financial and logistical benefits, enabling work from anywhere. But what about smaller businesses? Can they enjoy similar advantages? One cloud solution often overlooked due to its existence before the cloud trend is GoToMyPC. Although not typically associated with the cloud, it embodies the concept. GoToMyPC enables remote login to your computer. But isn’t accessing your desktop from a restaurant, running office applications, conceptually similar to using a private cloud?

item.title: Set Up Secure Remote Computer Access
item.description: Ever wondered how to access your computer remotely while traveling, working remotely, or at a different office? There’s a simple solution you can try for free. This technology, called remote access, allows you to securely connect to another computer and use it as if you were physically present. With remote access, you can forget about syncing files and applications between your laptop and desktop. You can directly log in to your remote desktop from your laptop to run applications, manage files, and even print remotely.

item.title: Take Your Office PC With You
item.description: Mobile professionals often rely on their laptops but might find themselves needing files left on their office desktops. Traveling long distances back for these files isn’t always feasible. Imagine accessing your office desktop from anywhere, anytime. This eliminates the worry of having the right files and removes the need for duplicates. Your laptop and a special application are all you need to make any computer your office computer. GoToMyPC is a remote access software, or KVM application, that allows this.
